sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT L.PRT_AT_CODE , L.MNG_YEAR , L.MNG_NO , L.MNG_CNT , (SELECT CD.CODE_NM FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE CD WHERE CD.CODE_ID = 'GAM019' AND CD.CODE = L.PRT_AT_CODE AND ROWNUM = 1) PRT_AT_CODE_NM , L.CHRGE_KND , (SELECT CD.CODE_NM FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE CD WHERE CD.CODE_ID = 'GAM024' AND CD.CODE = L.CHRGE_KND AND ROWNUM = 1) CHRGE_KND_NM , L.ACCNUT_YEAR , L.NTIC_CNT , TO_CHAR(L.NTIC_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') NTIC_DT , L.ENTRPSCD , L.ENTRPS_NM , TO_CHAR(L.PAY_TMLMT,'YYYY-MM-DD') PAY_TMLMT , L.FEE , L.NHT_PRINT_YN , L.RM , L.NTICNO , ( SELECT P.RCVD_TP FROM ERP_REV_COLL_F@YGPA_PORTMIS P WHERE P.BILL_NO = L.NTICNO AND ROWNUM = 1 ) RCVD_TP , TO_CHAR(( SELECT P.RCVD_DT FROM ERP_REV_COLL_F@YGPA_PORTMIS P WHERE P.BILL_NO = L.NTICNO AND ROWNUM = 1 ),'YYYY-MM-DD') RCVD_DT , ( SELECT P.BILL_AMNT FROM ERP_REV_COLL_F@YGPA_PORTMIS P WHERE P.BILL_NO = L.NTICNO AND ROWNUM = 1 ) BILL_AMNT FROM ASSETS_RENT_F A, LEV_REQEST_F L WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.PRT_AT_CODE = L.PRT_AT_CODE AND A.MNG_YEAR = L.MNG_YEAR AND A.MNG_NO = L.MNG_NO AND A.MNG_CNT = L.MNG_CNT
AND A.PRT_AT_CODE = #sPrtAtCode#
AND A.ENTRPSCD = #sEntrpscd#
AND L.MNG_YEAR = #sMngYear#
AND L.MNG_NO = #sMngNo#
AND L.MNG_CNT = #sMngCnt#
AND L.NTIC_PD_FROM >= TO_DATE(#sNticPdFrom#||'000000','yyyy-mm-ddhh24miss')
AND L.NTIC_PD_TO <= TO_DATE(#sNticPdTo#||'235959','yyyy-mm-ddhh24miss')
AND L.CHRGE_KND = #sChrgeKnd#
ORDER BY L.REGIST_DT DESC ) S ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM ASSETS_RENT_F A, LEV_REQEST_F L WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.PRT_AT_CODE = L.PRT_AT_CODE AND A.MNG_YEAR = L.MNG_YEAR AND A.MNG_NO = L.MNG_NO AND A.MNG_CNT = L.MNG_CNT
AND A.PRT_AT_CODE = #sPrtAtCode#
AND A.ENTRPSCD = #sEntrpscd#
AND L.MNG_YEAR = #sMngYear#
AND L.MNG_NO = #sMngNo#
AND L.MNG_CNT = #sMngCnt#
AND L.NTIC_PD_FROM >= TO_DATE(#sNticPdFrom#||'000000','yyyy-mm-ddhh24miss')
AND L.NTIC_PD_TO <= TO_DATE(#sNticPdTo#||'235959','yyyy-mm-ddhh24miss')
AND L.CHRGE_KND = #sChrgeKnd#
